title: A small request
body: Is it okay for me to ask Riot if they can change the Project skin shard that I got from this event, since I got PROJECT Yi skin shard which I already had. I just don't really wanna waste a really good event.......

replies.body: Man that really sucks you got a duplicate shard from that orb, but since all of those orbs and chests are known to be random, we won't be able to simply trade it out for something completely different.
